issues_found.issue: Missing external library dependency not caught during initial analysis
issues_found.root_cause: Scout phase didn't check if window.Fuse was available vs loaded
issues_found.solution: Check HTML script tags match JavaScript library references
issues_found.prevention: Scout should verify external CDN libraries are loaded when code references them

issues_found.issue: Empty DOM elements requiring JavaScript population not immediately obvious
issues_found.root_cause: HTML contained empty sidebar structure, required reading navigation.json to understand it needs JS population
issues_found.solution: Recognize pattern: empty DOM elements + JSON data file = needs population JavaScript
issues_found.prevention: Scout should flag empty DOM structures that have corresponding data files

issues_found.issue: type='module' on IIFE script prevented execution
issues_found.root_cause: HTML declared ES6 module but JavaScript was IIFE pattern
issues_found.solution: Check script type attribute matches JavaScript module format
issues_found.prevention: Architect should verify script loading attributes match code structure (IIFE vs ES6 module)

successful_patterns.pattern: Node.js HTTP test script for static site validation
successful_patterns.notes: Simple Node.js script using http module was fast and effective for validating fixes without browser automation

successful_patterns.pattern: Fetch navigation.json and populate DOM dynamically
successful_patterns.notes: Clean separation: data in JSON, presentation in HTML, population in JavaScript

successful_patterns.pattern: Bulk sed for consistent HTML changes across many files
successful_patterns.notes: Using sed for find/replace across 16 files was faster than individual Edit calls

recommendations.recommendation: Verify external library references match HTML script tags
recommendations.rationale: Would have caught Fuse.js missing from docs/index.html earlier

recommendations.recommendation: Validate script type attributes match code structure
recommendations.rationale: type='module' on IIFE caused complete JavaScript failure

recommendations.recommendation: Include browser console error check in automated tests
recommendations.rationale: Console errors would have caught script execution failures
